scripts.dev: cross-env NODE_ENV=development concurrently "npm run server" "cd frontend && npm run dev"
scripts.test: cross-env NODE_ENV=testing concurrently "npm run server" "cd frontend && npm run test"
scripts.stage: cross-env NODE_ENV=staging concurrently "npm run server" "cd frontend && npm run stage"
scripts.prod: cross-env NODE_ENV=production concurrently "npm run server" "cd frontend && npm run prod"
scripts.install-all: npm install && cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install
